website_summaries.verdict: An elegant-looking vanity light that is simple to install and offers sufficient lighting for most bathrooms.
pros: Painted glass shades and brushed nickel finish add elegance
cons: Occasional reports of receiving damaged products
A few buyers felt the glass shades were too thin

website_summaries.verdict: Mid-range value and quality for discerning renovators. Consumers often choose this unobtrusive style for their guest bathrooms.
pros: Bulbs are easy to find at major retailers
cons: Some reports of crooked shades or sockets
Some owners remark that the materials look cheap

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: This seems to burn up LED bulbs at a rate far greater than it should. On the second bulb change, the middle bulb socket itself started to rotate along with the bulb as I was trying to screw it in. Being sure to handle the situation gently, I still ended up with the metal base of the middle bulb breaking and collapsing over on it's side as seen in the pictures here. Weak weld? Great looking fixture while it lasted, but now it looks like trash. Not what I shelled out the money for, nor what I spent the money having installed.
customer_reviews.author: M. McLeod Thorp

customer_reviews.title: Classy looking.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice fixtures. The provided picture doesn't show it well, but they are mounted on a separate curved bar across the front. Took a couple pictures to show this, but we don't have a lot of natural light in our bathroom so had to use the flash
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful design
customer_reviews.text: This light is perfect for what I needed! It packed very well and was incredibly easy to install (the easiest part of my bathroom remodel). The brushed nickel is great and I love the texture of the light shades. It's just what the bathroom needed. I have it on a dimmer to adjust lighting as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Preston

customer_reviews.title: Light is wide enough to cover my electric box which ...
customer_reviews.text: Light is wide enough to cover my electric box which is not center on the wall and allowed me to center the fixture on the wall. It is 32 inches wide.
customer_reviews.author: davestaco

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous addition to our newly remodeled powder room. Gives off great amount of light.
customer_reviews.author: asmith1021

customer_reviews.title: cover the old hole from the previous vanity lights and look awesome. The completely updated the look of the bathroom
customer_reviews.text: We are remodeling a vintage 1980s house and needed something simple yet elegant for our bathroom vanities. We bought 4 of these and they are exactly what we needed. They were a breeze to install, cover the old hole from the previous vanity lights and look awesome. The completely updated the look of the bathroom. They give off a nice amount of light without being overwhelming. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: A. Bowman

customer_reviews.title: Great look & value overall
customer_reviews.text: Overall I really like the look of this light fixture - it goes great with the brushed nickel hardware in my bathroom. The price was great, free shipping and everything arrived in tact. The only downside was as others have said - attaching the globes to the fixtures was very difficult and once we finally got them on the fixtures were uneven. My husband was able to adjust them and they look decent now but definitely the design could be improved upon. But I’m happy with them and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Luminescence
customer_reviews.text: This gorgeous light fixture enhances a spa feel in my guest bathroom. It emits fabulously bright light (perfect for ladies make-up applications). I enjoy it with a dimmer switch for variable luminescence. It has inspired many compliments from my visitors, and is a tremendous upgrade from my prior builder's grade light. It requires special light bulbs that were low cost and easy to find (I bought mine at Target). Installation was standard for light fixtures. The brushed silver backing matches my other brushed silver fixtures and was delivered without any scratches. I love this fixture and am sure you will too! Just look at the difference in my before and after pictures! It's graceful elegance is undeniable.
customer_reviews.author: MsMontaraBeach

customer_reviews.title: The vanity light works fine and the light is aesthetically pleasing
customer_reviews.text: The vanity light works fine and the light is aesthetically pleasing. However, what I do not like is the fact that two of the three glass globes are crooked and do not line up properly and are not symmetrical. I would not try to bend them as I'm afraid they might break.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Moore

customer_reviews.title: Nice, modern fixture
customer_reviews.text: Had my brother install (he didn't complain about difficulty in installation) and it has worked nicely in the updated 60's bathroom. One issue I might mention...measure carefully! While the large base is fairly forgiving (depending on size of hole from previous fixture) and my brother was able to move my vanity slightly, but he fought with the old pipes, it still didn't get centered completely. It isn't off terribly, but could also be because the glass covers do their own thing (one goes slightly that-away) You only notice if you stand and stare at it. I would still buy it again...
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Nothing really great about these fixtures.
customer_reviews.text: I would not buy this product again. The glass globes which screw on to the metal light post are so small you can barely get your hand inside to screw the retaining ring to the metal post. The screw on retaining ring is the pits from the stand point that it is rough casting and very difficult to get the globes on straight. There are better products out there for less money. I bought 3 and rue the day I them. Charles
customer_reviews.author: James C Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and looks good
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install. Did it myself with the "help" of my 4 year old. Can be installed up or down. I like the texture lines on the glass shades. Instructions are one page with rough pictures but easy to follow. Tools needed for me included a level and pencil to ensure my placement was good, screwdriver, and hammer (for drywall anchor).
customer_reviews.author: BennettTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this light. Sturdy and super easy to install. The only reason I took a star away was because I couldn’t get two of the darn light covers to align and screw on properly over the light bulbs so they are kind of just sitting on top! Luckily, I have them facing up. It’s only been up for a month so if any problems arise, I’ll update. 😊
customer_reviews.author: Blippy

customer_reviews.title: Nice Fixture! Great Deal!
customer_reviews.text: Great fixture! Great value! Looks more like high end fixtures I've seen priced much higher. We needed a wide back plate to work around some off center wiring so this fit the bill. The globes are bright white so they worked great against an arctic blue wall and above a polished silver framed mirror. We found a little chip on one of the globes but the seller responded promptly to my request for a replacement! Great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Baxter

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Came very well packaged and had all the parts and assembly instructions included. Read the instructions before starting the installation! The fixture is sturdy, looks more expensive than what we have paid here. The light sconces have a nice stripe-like pattern in them, which isn't that noticeable when the light is on but a nice detail when off. We are giving this 4 star because the socket is ceramic. Which, I am sure is purposeful to manage heat but was a bit challenging when attempting to screw on the metal clamps. It has to be perfect. Now that these lights are up, we love how they look in our bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Love the look! Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Modern replacement for an older fixture. Nice contemporary look and goes well with black hardware because this “bronze” passes as black. I like how this one has the 24” base so that I only had to do a little paint touch up. Went from a 4 bulb to 3 bulb fixture but this one is just as (if not more) bright. The shades are a little tricky to attach because you have to put your hand inside to screw it into the fixture and if you have a bigger hand it takes some patience.. I’m very happy with it and will be getting one more for my second bath. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Elko

customer_reviews.title: Looks very nice
customer_reviews.text: This light fixture looks very nice and was the perfect update for my small bathroom. The globes are decent and pretty, not too fragile feeling. The worse thing of it is putting the globes on. The metal rings provided to screw on to the light socket to hold the globes are very difficult to catch the threads and then they don't slide easily around at all. I think this could have been designed a bit better.
customer_reviews.author: Shari Bond

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value for price. Bought 5 of these to update three bathrooms. Easy install, works great with LED bulbs. I recommend adding dimmer with LEDs. I mounted all my units facing UP for better indirect light distribution. Mounting allows you to easily flip it from up to down if you want to compare both ways
customer_reviews.author: Skiwithu2

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Install, Aesthetic, Functional
customer_reviews.text: I started painting an old oak vanity light fixture. I got through priming before I decided this is a stupid project, better off buying something new and shiny. This is fantastic quality for the price, and can be hung either up or down depending on if you want muted bathroom lighting or harsh right on your face lighting.
customer_reviews.author: jordan

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: Updated my bathroom nicely. Wish it had been just a little deeper as the carpenter had to add a board behind it to bring the middle light out beyond my wall-mounted medicine cabinet. Apparently wall-mounted medicine cabinets are a thing of the past but I had no choice. Maybe the mfg will consider that some of us still have wall-mounted cabinets and need lights that are at least 7-9 inches deep from light to wall?
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Worrell

customer_reviews.title: Pretty!
customer_reviews.text: I’m really pleased with this light. No joke I have bought, made my husband install, and returned 3 other lights. This light worked out well to update my powder room from matchy matchy all brushed nickel appointments to add a little contrast with the bronze. It wasn’t the easiest of the lights we have tried to install, but it’s doable and I’m really happy. I think I will probably buy 2 more lights to update my other 2 bathrooms.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Bathroom vanity light
customer_reviews.text: This bathroom light fixture looks even better in person. It has an expensive, custom look and really dresses up the bathroom. Plus: provides great light. Not hard to install by the do-it-yourselfer, either. Love the texture on the light shades. Looks like a fine Japanese lantern. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: A light worth the effort
customer_reviews.text: This light was the largest of three purchased. I strongly encourage an extra pair of hands as one installer has his hands more than filled by the heft and mounting finds the task challenging with only 2 hands. The final installation otherwise is fine and the unit rotates for light directed either upwards or down. The appearance and function are without any issues of note, a contemporary and fashionable form present on use.
customer_reviews.author: Curious

customer_reviews.title: New Vanity Lights!  Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Changed out old Hollywood strips for these more modern ones that use REGULAR old light bulbs. Yay! The G25 size replacement bulbs were a pain to have to buy. We installed with light bulbs downward-- easier to change the bulbs and not a dust and bug catcher! Really like them. (Sorry-- we're In the middle of bath re-do-- lights will look better once the mirror is back in place. :-) )
customer_reviews.author: JPB

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with this purchase 😊
customer_reviews.text: This vanity light looks great. We’ve put it in a small jack n Jill bathroom that we are in the process of remodeling. Easy to install, took my husband only few minutes. Puts out a great amount of light. We had purchased one similar for twice the money but was too large for our space. This one looks just as nice for considerably less. Time will tell if we have any rust issues.
customer_reviews.author: gwendolyn a fries

customer_reviews.title: Meh. It's ok.
customer_reviews.text: I like it more in the picture. It's not one of my better choices, but it's in my guest bath so I don't have to look at it everyday and so I kept it. It's not a high quality item, more like middle of the road. For me, it's the heavy frosting/glazing of the lights that turns me off. If you like that look, you'll be pleased with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Shopping made Easy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Quality throughout, from xlnt packing to the contents. Nothing flimsy. Brightness is dependent upon bulbs selected, rated up to 100 watt per bulb, for incadesent, which is most unusual...many only 60 watts.
customer_reviews.author: George4

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful light fixture. We remodeled my mom's 1970's era bathroom and included this light fixture. She loves the fixture. Easy to install as well.
customer_reviews.author: NikNor

customer_reviews.title: Wife loves the new look
customer_reviews.text: For the price it is worth it. The quality is fair we ordered both three lamp and larger four lamp model. However the four globe model was bent. Tried to reorder but second time came in with a broken glass globe. Vendor should pack them better for shipping.
customer_reviews.author: JMK

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking fixture
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful, inexpensive fixture to replace a very old dated one that came with the house. Blends well with a recent remodel, throws a great deal of light, and owns a beautiful finish, bought another for a second bath. highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: lm

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking Light Fixture...Not Terribly Difficult to Install
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking light fixture; I installed two of them in my master bathroom. I didn't find them terribly difficult to install, although it would have been helpful to have some way to keep the fixture up against the wall until it could be secured.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful light
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful light set. I replaced an old set and was looking for one with a large back plate and this one was perfect. I didn't do the install myself but my electrician had no complaints. I get lots of compliments on this light- great product for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: D Georger

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: We loved this light, but broke one of the glass pieces during installation. I contacted customer service and they sent us a replacement at no cost, but the replacement was not an exact match. I contacted them again and they immediately apologized and got us the right piece which was perfect. The light looks great and you can feel confident buying knowing that if something isn't right, they'll be responsive and committed to fixing it.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Miller

customer_reviews.title: Simple and stylish for the bathroom!
customer_reviews.text: Added this fixture to my guest bathroom. It was easy to install. We liked this fixture sitting upwards, and adding the soft white compact fluorescent lights gave it a warm look for the room. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie LD

customer_reviews.title: Flexible mounting, robust hardware
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at the quality of this light fixture. It's not a lightweight. We needed only four 40W equivalent LED lamps to have amble bathroom light. Though we did face in downward.
customer_reviews.author: HClarkxTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: It’s not brushed nickel
customer_reviews.text: It works fine, but it is not brushed nickel, it’s brushed pewter and says so right on the box. The listing does not mention that at all, which is misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, quality, well made!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality materials and well made. Unfortunately this was difficult to install and ended up being not compatible to install in my bathroom with existing setup. Otherwise elegant, well made, and quality materials.
customer_reviews.author: BaylorUTechnology

customer_reviews.title: nice lights.
customer_reviews.text: The only reason they didn't get five starts is that the shades are a bit of a pain to put on, and they are not always perfectly even. Other than that, nice lights.
customer_reviews.author: Bacbldr

customer_reviews.title: Make sure to have a second set of hands to help wire it up.
customer_reviews.text: Love the fixture. Looks and feels like quality. Bought a different light for a different bathroom that cost more than twice the price of this one and it was very flimsy and has exposed screws that could've easily been hidden with a better design, but weren't. The Lakeland is very nice. Have someone hold it for you when you wire it up, also have someone with small hands help screw the light covers on. Great
customer_reviews.author: Miatamike1991

customer_reviews.title: Expensive look without the high price tag
customer_reviews.text: They really add class to a small bathroom. I love that they are dimmable. Be sure to buy dimmable bulbs, and Walmart had the best price!
customer_reviews.author: A. G. Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Nice lights for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Just had these installed and I am impressed by the quality. Bought (2) and both arrived without and damage. Always fear that one of the glass covers can break in transit.
customer_reviews.author: David M.

customer_reviews.title: Love It!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I installed this light and it truly looks amazing in my guest bathroom....I am so happy with the purchase and the price of the light.....
customer_reviews.author: K. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: They look just as good if not better than the products you see at ...
customer_reviews.text: These lights are very sharp looking! They look just as good if not better than the products you see at the hardware stores. I would recommend them and this company, excellent product and company to do business with!
customer_reviews.author: SamAZ

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful quality. I had to use low wattage bulbs ...
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful quality. I had to use low wattage bulbs or it was too bright but would highly recommend. Great product for great price.
customer_reviews.author: My opinion

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice!
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. Allowed me to install working around a box that wasn't centered above my sink. Looks nice!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Lovely and sturdy fixture
customer_reviews.text: Great light for the price. The lamp shades are lovely and of a good quality. The packaging was secure and everything arrived in perfect condition - something I worried about shipping such a delicate item. We mounted it without the electrical box option and it worked out great.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela MK

customer_reviews.title: Affordable quality, appealing look
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for the price. Adds modern touch of glam and just the right amount of brightness to our recent bathroom remodel. Great buy! Will update if anything changes. Was easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Kranig

customer_reviews.title: good light
customer_reviews.text: Works well, it's as delicate as any other light, so if it doesn't show up damaged or get roughed up, it's good.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Love the brushed nickel finish
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for my bathroom, & I just love it
customer_reviews.author: Ramona Jansen

customer_reviews.title: Ok light.
customer_reviews.text: Not very heavy duty at all. Thin gauge metal. Wiring was done very well. Glass globes are paper thin. Over all it looks ok.
customer_reviews.author: B Square

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: Gives off a good amount of light and was easy to install
customer_reviews.author: BC

customer_reviews.title: Awesome looking
customer_reviews.text: It looks perfect in the bathroom, its high quality at a really good price!
customer_reviews.author: SandyEggo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our bath renovation
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our bath renovation. The globes are delicate and have a bit of texture. I loved them so much I purchased the 4 globe fixture for the master bath reno. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn F. Wachter

customer_reviews.title: Lights that light!
customer_reviews.text: No problems for me. Quality seemed good. I like the way it looks.
customer_reviews.author: MadDad

customer_reviews.title: Let there be light
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install nice looking. I mounted it with globes and bulbs pointing down it looked better in our space.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Ural

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, but assembly is difficult.
customer_reviews.text: Wiring it up was easy, and it looks very nice. However, be prepared to spend some time assembling the unit, attaching the light covers is very difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Annie S.

customer_reviews.title: Looks beautiful. I installed the lighting with the lights down ...
customer_reviews.text: This was just the right lighting in our remolded bathroom. Looks beautiful. I installed the lighting with the lights down with us great tor applying you makeup. Would order the lighting again.
customer_reviews.author: Mina

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully handcrafted fixture
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this fixture! Was easy to install. It is so beautifully made. And you can change the light color by changing the led A19 light bulbs. I bought 3000k A19 bulbs and the light color is great. Bulbs are not included with the fixture. But you can find them easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beware - no free returns
customer_reviews.text: We bought similar fixture from another seller and it was much better. The metal on this one is very dark, almost black, with no sheen at all. Makes it look cheap. We sent it back and were charged $14 for shipping. No indication of this on the product page, so unless you are sure you will keep it, order elsewhere!
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Very simple, modern and clean look.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these for our bathrooms and they are exactly how it looks in the photos. I looked all over for the vanity lights with a large base plate and was able to find only this model which would fit the previous base measurements. Very simple, modern and clean look. It goes well with other gold hardware as well. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Toshie lucas

customer_reviews.title: Happy!!
customer_reviews.text: Really pretty!! Perfect for my apartment and love the brushed nickel.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for all three bathroom areas
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for but couldn't find anywhere locally. All of our lighting has been purchased from Amazon and I was pleased with every single item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice set and reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Nice set and reasonable price. but be careful about the light socks, they feels a little flimsy, don't use your full power to twist the light bulb on. and you need small hand to secure the light bulb covers. ( i have to ask my daughter to help on this)
customer_reviews.author: yuan yuan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: The light is the perfect size and it looks beautiful in our bathroom. Easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: Good Choice!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very attractive lighting fixture, and well suits its use in the bathroom. In my home, the lamps are oriented with the base down.
customer_reviews.author: W. Byrd

customer_reviews.title: One of the light sockets has the slightest of bend in it but other than that not bad.
customer_reviews.text: Installed more or less without any difficulty. One of the light sockets has the slightest of bend in it but other than that not bad.
customer_reviews.author: Brian M. Watson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I love these. Great for small spaces but they also have longer ones. High quality and classy
customer_reviews.author: Helen K. Avila

customer_reviews.title: Stylish without Costing an Arm and a Leg
customer_reviews.text: This is a very stylish light that looks perfect in the small bathroom. Good value too!
customer_reviews.author: Ross Family

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful light
customer_reviews.text: This light is perfect in our new bathroom. Love everything about it. Easy to install and when a light cover was broken, they promptly sent me a replacement. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa gurney

customer_reviews.title: Attractive light fixture
customer_reviews.text: I just received this light fixture and had it installed 2 days ago. It is what I expected and replaced an old light fixture in a bathroom. It seems to be a good fixture.
customer_reviews.author: MN

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Great light fixture. So glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Marco

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Light
customer_reviews.text: Lots of light with 3 5W LEDs. Looks nice and clean
customer_reviews.author: Fritz

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous lighting
customer_reviews.text: This light has wonderful lighting bright yet not over powering. Great quality!! I love it
customer_reviews.author: Tami

customer_reviews.title: It was OK
customer_reviews.text: One of the lights was a little tilted but we didn't realize it until after we installed it. It bugged me so much that we just took it down and I'm replacing it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Skeldon

customer_reviews.title: ... the least expensive item I purchased and it looks great! I was very pleasantly surprised with this product ...
customer_reviews.text: I just finished a very upscale bathroom addition and this was the least expensive item I purchased and it looks great! I was very pleasantly surprised with this product - really worth the cost. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Gail J Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love these they look lovely in my bath room just the right light
customer_reviews.author: Laura Garry

customer_reviews.title: Light fixture
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful in our newly renovated bathroom. Gives it an nice updated look and classy.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Jones

customer_reviews.title: Quality lighting fixture
customer_reviews.text: Well made lighting fixture, throws a lot of light and is stylish
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: It is perfect for our bathroom
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect for our bathroom. Good quality and easy to install. We are getting lots of compliments on this fixture. It gives off a nice light, once you figure out the wattage of the bulbs you want to use.
customer_reviews.author: Cat Family

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fixture and great price!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fixture at a great price point! I thought the light globes were possibly plastic but was pleasantly surprised that they are glass.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: These lights are very well made and have the look of a much more expensive light. I would highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: Installed two of those in the bathroom and it generated the atmospheric view of high-end hotel. Good quality product.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great look for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful fixture - perfect fit and style for a smaller bathroom vanity! In this older home- the fixture had to be retrofitted with a pull chain. It was very easy to install and with a pretty decorative piece on the chain it was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: charlotte gallemore

customer_reviews.title: Well done
customer_reviews.text: Well done design, but the brackets inside the bulb covers are a bit tricky if you have big hands. Get your wife or kid to put them in to save some cursing!
customer_reviews.author: Bobby W.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Needed these fixtures for our new home. Love how they look and are way better than our first attempt. We love the look and the price!
customer_reviews.author: Muppert

customer_reviews.title: Very nice light fixture
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product - perfect fit for our master bath!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Nolan

customer_reviews.title: Not perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, but the part that holds one of the shades is bent so the shade doesn't hang totally vertical. It bends in and actually almost touches the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Good design for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Installed this bathroom vanity light today. Easy to install. Pretty good quality of materials and design for the price compared to big box stores. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Mcdonald

customer_reviews.title: Product is as it appears on line
customer_reviews.text: The product was way more than I expected. It even came 2 days before scheduled delivery date.
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: 3 Bulb Vanity
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my chrome light fixture with this amazing chrome light fixture. Love Thomas it allows you to flip the fixture according to your taste. This just made my bathroom!
customer_reviews.author: James M

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Had these up a year now and still love them!
customer_reviews.author: ann

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and moder
customer_reviews.text: I got two of these vanity lights for our newly remodeled bathroom. They were easy to install and bring a great updated modern look to the room. They provide plenty of light, even using 40W bulbs. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Joan T

customer_reviews.title: Works great, looks even better
customer_reviews.text: Great new contemporary look for a dated bathroom at a great price
customer_reviews.author: Christopher W. Bradley

customer_reviews.title: looks great up.
customer_reviews.text: decent qaulity.. looks great up.. was able to install from off center... worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Karp

customer_reviews.title: Love this light fixture.
customer_reviews.text: I'm really glad I got these. I placed the cups down so they don't collect so much dust. They are perfect so far as my vanity lights.
customer_reviews.author: New York RestoMod

product_meta.title: Bennington Lakeland 3-Bulb Bath Vanity Light Fixture Bar, Brushed Nickel
product_meta.description: Color:Nickel| Size:3-LightThe 3-bulb vanity light is sure to add a sophisticated look to your decor with an attractive smooth curved line look. The Hampton collection 3-bulb vanity fixture features a brushed nickel finish and white line painted glass. The light can be mounted up or down providing an opportunity for a different look. Uses 3 100-watt bulbs, type a19 (not included). The light fixture is 8-1/2-inch x 24-inch x 7-inch. Comes with a 1 year warranty. This manufacturer has a long and successful history of supplying lighting and ceiling fans. They work diligently to create a comprehensive selection of styles and designs as well as maintaining high standards of product quality and value.
feature_bullets: Brushed nickel finish with line painted glass globes
Can be mounted up or down
Featuring transitional styling, the Lakeland collection adds a sophisticated look to your decor
Fixture measures 24" W x 8.5" H x 7" D
Requires (3) 100W maximum (or equivalent) Type A light bulbs (LED, CFL, Halogen, or Incandescent) – not included
